thread.title: Small plane crashes at Tucson Airport; no injuries reported - @KVOA
thread.title_full: Small plane crashes at Tucson Airport; no injuries reported - @KVOA

author: Tom Brew
title: Small plane crashes at Tucson Airport; no injuries reported - @KVOA
text:
Small plane crashes at Tucson International Airport Posted: Updated: 
TUCSON- A small plane crashed at the Tucson International Airport Thursday afternoon, according to TIA spokeswoman Viki Matthews. 
The crash occurred around 1 p.m. 
Matthews said there were no reported injuries. 
Crews are working to clean up the area. There are no restrictions to flights due to the incident. TUCSON- Tucson Police say more spikes were found in manhole covers on the Eastside Thursday morning.According to TPD, the spikes were found on Kolb Road near Speedway.This is the fourth time this year spikes have been found in manhole covers on the Eastside. The first report was on January 28 near the intersection of Golf Links and Harrison.
